item.title: Coronavirus + flu = Flurona. Where cases have been reported? - Mint"
item.description: In many countries, last year's flu season was the least harmful in more than a decade.

item.title: On Polls Amid Covid, Centre's Health Officer To Brief Election Body Today - NDTV
item.description: Union Health Secretary Rajesh Bhushan will brief the Election Commission this morning on the Covid situation - specifically the threat posed by the Omicron strain - in Uttar Pradesh and four other states due to hold elections in February-March.

item.title: Why AUKUS is good for containing Chinese belligerence in Indo-Pacific? - Hindustan Times
item.description: The signing of security pact between Japan and Australia today brings former World War II adversaries on the same page on Indo-Pacific and acts as a deterrent to Chinese aggression. | World News

item.title: At Delhi's Chandni Chowk Market, 60 Shops Charred In Dawn Blaze - NDTV
item.description: A massive fire has broken out in Delhi's Chandni Chowk and 12 fire engines have been rushed to the spot to douse the flames.
